title: nicat
description: Copies stdin to the NIML stream, which will be opened for writing.

reopen.title: Reopen stream
reopen.description: Reopen the stream after connection to the stream specified by the given value.

copy_stream.title: Copy stream to stdout
copy_stream.description: Copy the stream to stdout instead; the 'streamspec' will be opened for reading.

read_only.title: Read stream only
read_only.description: Read the stream but don't copy to stdout.
